msbt.message: The Fishing Tourney's today. Fishing is so chill.
I'm gonna catch SO many fish today!
The tourney starts at nine o'clock!<10_4 /> I'm so excited that I stayed up all night eating snacks, !
The tourney has started! I'm gonna catch a yummy-looking fish!
Fishing is just about the most chill thing you can do outdoors. So let's fish, !

I'm gonna try my best to win Unless I catch a really tasty-looking fish! I'm eatin' that guy!Unless it's an endangered fish. Eating those ain't cool.Also, I can't eat a fishy that sings. I've heard about those. Dunno if they're real, but why take a chance?Ugh, man, I guess I'm not eating any fishies today!
Today's tourney was so much fun!<10_4 /> Yup. I'm all tourney-ed out!
Today's tourney was so close. All the excitement really got my tummy rumblin', !
I have so many fish from the tourney. I guess I oughta take one home? Maybe a few?I bet the bugs in my floor would like to meet them.
Fishing is like playing tug-of-war with a fish! Gotta tug at just the right timeOr they'll yank you right into the water! A huh huh huh!
Grilled, braised, roasted, fried, baked, steamed, poached, saut√©ed, tacosHuh? Oh. Hi, .
I'm not very good at fishingNow, if this was a nap-off!
I wonder how many fish I'll catch?<10_4 /> I'm gonna try and get more than you, . A huh huh huh!
Isn't the Fishing Tourney more fun than on your birthday, ? Actually I take it back! I take it back!
I may not catch the most fish, or ANY fish, but I'm giving it the ol' try! A huh huh!
It's a great day for fishing! The water is wet and the sky is up! A huh huh huh
Notice anything different about me today? <10_4 />I'm suddenly great at fishing! Just go with it,
